ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
The electromagnetic modeller empymod can model electric or magnetic
responses due to a three-dimensional electric or magnetic source in a
layered-earth model with vertical transverse isotropic (VTI) resistivity,
VTI electric permittivity, and VTI magnetic permeability, from very low
frequencies (DC) to very high frequencies (GPR). The calculation is carried
out in the wavenumber-frequency domain, and various Hankel- and
Fourier-transform methods are included to transform the responses into the
space-frequency and space-time domains.
about.summary: Open-source full 3D electromagnetic modeller for 1D VTI media

about.description:
The electromagnetic modeller empymod can model electric or magnetic
responses due to a three-dimensional electric or magnetic source in a
layered-earth model with vertical transverse isotropic (VTI) resistivity,
VTI electric permittivity, and VTI magnetic permeability, from very low
frequencies (DC) to very high frequencies (GPR). The calculation is carried
out in the wavenumber-frequency domain, and various Hankel- and
Fourier-transform methods are included to transform the responses into the
space-frequency and space-time domains.
about.summary: Open-source full 3D electromagnetic modeller for 1D VTI media

name: empymod
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set python_min = "3.11" %}
{% set name = "empymod" %}
{% set version = "2.6.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: afbd64507270b30c187c90402c550a88a3136cd793010216cf17f97df6c168f7

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - empymod=empymod.__main__:main

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=2.0.0
    - scipy
    - numba
    - libdlf
    - scooby

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - empymod
    - empymod.scripts

about:
  home: https://emsig.xyz
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Open-source full 3D electromagnetic modeller for 1D VTI media
  description: |
    The electromagnetic modeller empymod can model electric or magnetic
    responses due to a three-dimensional electric or magnetic source in a
    layered-earth model with vertical transverse isotropic (VTI) resistivity,
    VTI electric permittivity, and VTI magnetic permeability, from very low
    frequencies (DC) to very high frequencies (GPR). The calculation is carried
    out in the wavenumber-frequency domain, and various Hankel- and
    Fourier-transform methods are included to transform the responses into the
    space-frequency and space-time domains.
  doc_url: https://empymod.emsig.xyz
  dev_url: https://github.com/emsig/empymod

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - prisae
